text: Paul T. Herman (July 5, 1921 – July 20, 1972) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Youngstown Bears and Flint Dow A.C.'s and averaged 5.8 points per game. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1972 deaths Category:American army personnel of World War II Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Flint Dow A.C.'s players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Military personnel from Ohio Category:Sportspeople from Massillon, Ohio Category:Tennessee Volunteers basketball players Category:Youngstown Bears players
title: Paul Herman (basketball)
